## Discussion

The system doesn’t call [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotEvaluationProvider] to evaluate any Wi-Fi network whose SSID is found in this array.

# evaluatedSSIDs

**Instance Property**

An array of pre-evaluated Wi-Fi SSID strings.

## Declaration

```swift
final var evaluatedSSIDs: [String] { get set }
```

## Discussion

The system doesn’t call [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotEvaluationProvider] to evaluate any Wi-Fi network whose SSID is found in this array.
title: evaluatedSSIDs
